item.title: Ukrainian Naval Drones Cripple Two Russian Oil Tankers In Black Sea, Disrupt Moscow's Shadow‑Fleet Operations
item.description: Ukrainian naval drones struck 2 sanctioned tankers in Black Sea, critically damaging both and crippling a key Russian oil‑transport route. read more

item.title: Venezuela Condemns Trump Airspace Closure As 'Colonialist Threat,' Senate Democrats Raise War Powers Concerns
